titles.title: Acknowledging and thanking America's birth centers for their high quality and high value model of health care, and expressing support for the recognition of the week of September 14 through 20, 2024, as "National Birth Center Week".

Acknowledging and thanking America's birth centers for their high quality and high value model of health care, and expressing support for the recognition of the week of September 14 through 20, 2024, as "National Birth Center Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes National Birth Center Week.
